public class loops {

			  public static void main(String[] args) { 
			  // TODO Auto-generated method stub 
			  // for loop  
			   
			//  for(initialization ; conditionCheck ; increment/decrement) { 
			//  } 
			   
			  // print from  0 - 3 
			   
			  for(int i = 0 ; i < 4 ;i++) { // i- 1 , 2 , 3 
			   System.out.println(i); // 0 , 1 , 2 
			  
			  }
